info.title: JobsRnR Public API
info.description:
[JobsRnR](https://www.jobsrnr.com) Public API is a RESTful API built over HTTP. This Public API allows searching of Tags, Industries and Job openings, in addition to obtaining canoncial URLs for Job openings with Referral Codes.
# API Key
Please contact us at JobsRnR in order to retrieve your API Key.
# Throttling and Rate Limiting
The API has a throttling mechanism, so we encourage some sort of caching. Throttling and Rate Limiting details:
* Rate - 5 requests per second
* Burst - 600 requests
* Quota - 20,000 requests per month starting on the 1st day
As we develop this API, we may start adjusting (relaxing) these restrictions.
# Current Status and Feedback
This API is still in its early stages, so there may still be some breaking changes. Please feel free to reach out to us at [JobsRnR](https://www.jobsrnr.com) with any feedback so that we can improve on this API.
# Terms and Conditions
By using this API, you agree to the [API Terms of Services](https://www.jobsrnr.com/api-terms).

get.description: Search Tags with results sorted by ID, ascending.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Keywords to search for in the following fields of a Tag: name, name_zh_tw, name_zh

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Integer representing page number. Pages are zero-indexed - the first set of results returned is on page 0. Size per page is set to 50.

403.description: Forbidden - missing API Key in x-api-key Header

500.description: Server Error - Unable to Search Tags

get.description: Search Industries with results sorted by ID, ascending.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Keywords to search for in the following fields of an Industry: name, name_zh_tw, name_zh

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Integer representing page number. Pages are zero-indexed - the first set of results returned is on page 0. Size per page is set to 50.

403.description: Forbidden - missing API Key in x-api-key Header

500.description: Server Error - Unable to Search Industries

get.description: Search Job openings with results sorted by score and post_date, descending. All Job openings returned by this API are 'open'.

parameters.name: rewardCondition
parameters.description: String value of either hired or first_interview_completed.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Keywords to search for in the following fields of a Job: title, description, company_name, company_description, company_description_zh_tw, company_description_zh

parameters.name: referralCode
parameters.description: Setting this to 'true' will also fetch and include your Referral Code in the canonical URLs, as well as the search result object

parameters.name: featured
parameters.description: Either 'true' or 'false' - denotes whether a Job is Featured or not.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: ID(s) of tags that a Job must have.

parameters.name: contractType
parameters.description: Integer ID of the Contract Type for a Job

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Integer representing page number. Pages are zero-indexed - the first set of results returned is on page 0. Size per page is set to 10.

parameters.name: seniority
parameters.description: String value of one of the following: entry, middle, senior

403.description: Forbidden - missing API Key in x-api-key Header

500.description: Server Error - Unable to Search Jobs

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the Job opening to get

parameters.name: referralCode
parameters.description: Setting this to 'true' will also fetch and include your Referral Code in the canonical URLs, as well as the result object

403.description: Forbidden - missing API Key in x-api-key Header

404.description: Unable to find Job opening with this ID

500.description: Server Error - Unable to Get Job

get.description: Search Cities with results sorted by ID, ascending.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Keywords to search for in the following fields of a City: name, name_zh_tw, name_zh, country_name, country_name_zh_tw, country_name_zh

parameters.name: withJobs
parameters.description: Set to 'true' in order to return Cities with Job openings only

403.description: Forbidden - missing API Key in x-api-key Header

500.description: Server Error - Unable to Search Cities

id.description: Unique ID for this Job opening

description.description: A description for this Job Opening

min_salary_range.description: Lower bound range of Salary offered for this Job opening. All values are integers in HKD, with the lowest unit of the currency being the dollar.

max_salary_range.description: Upper bound range of Salary offered for this Job opening. All values are integers in HKD, with the lowest unit of the currency being the dollar.

yrs_experience.description: Approximation of years of experienced required for this Job opening. Numeric type with a precision of 4 and scale of 1 - fractional values are possible (ex. 2.5 years experience)

seniority.description: Seniority level of this Job opening. Possible values are 'entry', 'middle', and 'senior'

referrer_reward.description: Reward in HKD paid out to the Referrer if the referral was a success. Values are integers in HKD, with the lowest unit of the currency being the dollar.

candidate_reward.description: Reward in HKD paid out to the Candidate if the application was a success. Values are integers in HKD, with the lowest unit of the currency being the dollar.

reward_condition_id.description: ID of the Reward Condition for this Job opening

reward_condition.description: Reward Condition for this Job opening. Possible values are 'hired' and 'first_interview_completed'

post_date.description: Date when this Job opening was created

slug.description: URL Slug for this Job opening

status.description: Status for this Job opening. Possible values are 'open', 'closed', and 'pending'. The Public API only returns Job openings that are open

meta_title.description: Meta Title for this Job opening, in English

meta_description.description: Meta Description for this Job opening, in English

meta_title_zh_tw.description: Optional Meta Title for this Job opening, in Traditional Chinese

meta_description_zh_tw.description: Optional Meta Description for this Job opening, in Traditional Chinese

meta_title_zh.description: Optional Meta Title for this Job opening, in Simplified Chinese

meta_description_zh.description: Optional Meta Description for this Job opening, in Simplified Chinese

featured_at.description: Timestamp indicating if this Job opening is a Featured Job opening. A job opening is a Featured opening if the timestamp is present

cover_image.description: URL of the Cover Image for this Job opening

is_anonymous.description: Boolean indicating whether this Job opening is anonymous or not. If true, Company related fields will be set to null.

company_id.description: ID of the Company hiring for this Job opening

company_name.description: Name of the Company hiring for this Job opening, in English

company_name_zh_tw.description: Optional name of the Company hiring for this Job opening, in Traditional Chinese

company_name_zh.description: Optional name of the Company hiring for this Job opening, in Simplified Chinese

company_logo.description: URL of the Logo for the Company hiring for this Job opening

company_website_url.description: URL of the Company hiring for this Job opening, without the protocol

company_website_protocol.description: Preferred protocol for the Website URL of the Company hiring for this Job. Possible values are http:// or https://

company_description.description: Description of the Company that owns this Job opening, in English

company_description_zh_tw.description: Optional Description of the Company hiring for this Job opening, in Traditional Chinese

company_description_zh.description: Optional Description of the Company hiring for this Job opening, in Simplified Chinese

tags.description: List of Tags associated with this Job opening

industry_id.description: ID for the Industry this Job opening belongs to

industry_name.description: Name for the Industry this Job opening belongs to, in English

industry_name_zh_tw.description: Name for the Industry this Job opening belongs to, in Traditional Chinese

industry_name_zh.description: Name for the Industry this Job opening belongs to, in Simplified Chinese

contract_type_id.description: Contract Type ID for this Job Opening

contract_type_name.description: Contract Type for this Job opening, in English

contract_type_name_zh_tw.description: Contract Type for this Job opening, in Traditional Chinese

contract_type_name_zh.description: Contract Type for this Job opening, in Simplified Chinese

city_id.description: ID of the City where this Job opening is located

city_name.description: Name of the City this Job opening is located in, in English

city_name_zh_tw.description: Name of the City this Job opening is located in, in Traditional Chinese

city_name_zh.description: Name of the City this Job opening is located in, in Simplified Chinese

city_hide_country.description: Boolean to indicate whether you should append the country after the city. Purely aesthetic. Example: Hong Kong instead of Hong Kong, China or Singapore instead of Singapore, Singapore

country_name.description: Name of the Country this Job opening is located in, in English

country_name_zh_tw.description: Name of the Country this Job opening is located in, in Traditional Chinese

country_name_zh.description: Name of the Country this Job opening is located in, in Simplified Chinese

canonical_url.description: Canonical URL to this Job opening in English, with Referral Code attached in query if requested

canonical_url_zh_tw.description: Canonical URL to this Job opening in Traditional Chinese, with Referral Code attached in query if requested

canonical_url_zh.description: Canonical URL to this Job opening in Simplified Chinese, with Referral Code attached in query if requested

name.description: Name for this Tag, in English

name_zh_tw.description: Name for this Tag, in Traditional Chinese

name_zh.description: Name for this Tag, in Simplified Chinese

result.description: Job opening returned given the ID

result.title: Content and Digital Marketing Specialist / Manager
result.description:
JobsRnR is looking for a Content and Digital Marketing Manager to take the lead in marketing our referral-based jobs platform. At JobsRnR, we strongly believe that peer-to-peer referrals represent the strongest form of endorsement.

The Candidate will be in a position to make key decisions regarding all content pertaining to JobsRnR, with the primary goal of increasing traffic and profile.
result.meta_title: Content and Digital Marketing Specialist / Manager
result.meta_description: JobsRnR is looking for a Content and Digital Marketing Manager to take the lead in marketing our referral-based jobs platform. At JobsRnR, we strongly believe that peer-to-peer referrals represent the strongest form of endorsement.
result.company_description: JobsRnR was founded on the simple belief that peer-to-peer referrals represent the strongest form of endorsement. Our goal is to connect employers with qualified and talented job seekers, at lower costs and with greater efficiency.
result.company_description_zh_tw: JobsRnR 是香港首個以賞金為基礎的工作推薦平台。在JobsRnR體系下，您可以透過"分享"個人網絡，推薦朋友到合適既工作以賺取賞金。JobsRnR是一個無論推薦更好工作的機會予朋友，抑或尋找著數機會都合適既平台。
result.company_description_zh: JobsRnR 是香港首个以赏金为基础的工作推荐平台。在JobsRnR体系下，您可以透过"分享"个人网络，推荐朋友到合适既工作以赚取赏金。 JobsRnR是一个无论推荐更好工作的机会予朋友，抑或寻找着数机会都合适既平台。

results.description: List of Jobs returned for this page
